document_data.name: Arlen
document_data.mainbody: '''Arlen''' was the captain of the guard at [[Caer Corwell]] and the teacher of [[Tristan Kendrick|Prince Tristan Kendrick]].
document_data.Description: Arlen was a gruff old war veteran.
document_data.Personality: While training Prince Kendrick, Arlen had the youth run across the moors for exercise.

History.Death: Arlen died in [[1345 DR]] while fighting a group of [[firbolg]]s in [[Llaryth Forest]].
